message.content:
1. Paravertebral block (PVB) has benefits on pain after thoracotomy.
2. PVB has benefits on pain after mastectomy.
3. There have been investigations on the effects of PVB on pain after thoracotomy and mastectomy.
4. There have not been enough investigations on the effects of PVB on pain after open cholecystectomy.

messages.content:
Statement: While the benefits of paravertebral block (PVB) on pain after thoracotomy and mastectomy have been demonstrated, not enough investigations on the effects of PVB on pain after open cholecystectomy have been conducted.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
